detaileddescription.para: Calibrate IMU
This takes approximately 2 seconds, and is a non-blocking operation.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is already calibrating

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Set the Inertial Sensor's refresh interval in milliseconds.
The rate may be specified in increments of 5ms, and will be rounded down to the nearest increment. The minimum allowable refresh rate is 5ms. The default rate is 10ms.

As values are copied into the shared memory buffer only at 10ms intervals, setting this value to less than 10ms does not mean that you can poll the sensor's values any faster. However, it will guarantee that the data is as recent as possible.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The data refresh interval in milliseconds

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Get the total number of degrees the Inertial Sensor has spun about the z-axis
This value is theoretically unbounded. Clockwise rotations are represented with positive degree values, while counterclockwise rotations are represented with negative ones.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The degree value or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's heading relative to the initial direction of its x-axis
This value is bounded by (-360,360). Clockwise rotations are represented with positive degree values, while counterclockwise rotations are represented with negative ones.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The degree value or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Get a quaternion representing the Inertial Sensor's orientation

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The quaternion representing the sensor's orientation. If the operation failed, all the quaternion's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Euler angles representing the Inertial Sensor's orientation

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The Euler angles representing the sensor's orientation. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's pitch angle

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The pitch angle, or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's roll angle

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The roll angle, or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's yaw angle

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The yaw angle, or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's raw gyroscope values

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The raw gyroscope values. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's raw acceleroneter values

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The raw accelerometer values. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's status

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The Inertial Sensor's status code, or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Check whether the IMU is calibrating

simplesect.para: true if the V5 Inertial Sensor is calibrating or false false if it is not.
